DrugInfoMetaData.DrugInfoDescription: This page contains brief information about imatinib mesylate and a collection of links to more information from the National Cancer Institute (NCI), the Food and Drug Administration (FDA), and the National Library of Medicine (NLM).

Section.Para: Imatinib mesylate is approved by the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) to treat some forms of adult and childhood chronic myelogenous leukemia (CML), and to treat a type of stomach cancer called gastrointestinal stromal tumor (GIST).
Imatinib mesylate is also being studied in the treatment of other types of cancer.
